name: Advanced User Access Manager
author: WPFound

sections.description:
Introducing Advanced User Access Manager for WordPress – your go-to solution for precise user control. Easily restrict page access, customize login redirect, and redesign your login page. Take charge of your WordPress experience effortlessly with Advanced User Access Manager.

FEATURES

  • Enable / Disable Restriction
  • Specific Page Restriction
  • All Page Restriction
  • Show Login Form
  • Page Redirect
  • Redirect specific page to URL
  • Login Page Customize
  • Login / Logout Home Page
  • Redirect Custom Login / Logout
  • Redirect Login / Logout custom URL
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “Advanced User Access Manager”
  3. Install the “Advanced User Access Manager” plugin
  4. Activate “Advanced User Access Manager” from your Plugins page
